Chap. 16 - The Church Expansion Movement

                   The Divine Plan 

     It is not the purpose of God that His people should colonize, or settle together in large communities. The disciples of Christ are His representatives upon the earth, and God designs that they shall be scattered all over the country, in the towns, cities, and villages, as lights amidst the darkness of the world.--Testimonies, vol. 8, p. 244.
